text: aur vah din yaad karo jis din ham har ek giroh mein se unheen mein ka ek gavaah unake muqaabil la khada karegen aur (ai rasool) tum ko un logon par (unake) saamane gavaah banaakar la khada karengen aur hamane tum par kitaab (quraan) naazil kee jisamen har cheez ka (shaaphee) bayaan hai aur musalamaanon ke lie (saramaapa) hidaayat aur rahamat aur khushakhabaree hai
